pages.text: $(tool)Vein Miner$() (AOE Mining) breaks all connected blocks of the same type when you mine one!$(br2)Perfect for clearing out entire ore veins or large patches of blocks in one action.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(2F2F2F)Coal$() grants $(tool)Vein Miner +1$()$(br2)Mine veins as easily as the coal that powers it!

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When you break a block with Vein Miner:$(br2)1. The mod searches for all blocks of the same type touching it$(br)2. All connected blocks break instantly$(br)3. Drops are collected normally$(br2)$(important)Respects tool durability$() - each block costs durability!

pages.title: Best Uses
pages.text: $(li)Clear entire diamond veins$(li)Remove large tree trunks$(li)Excavate stone quickly$(li)Clear ore clusters$(li)Harvest connected crops$(br2)$(important)Pro tip:$() Combine with $(tool)Durability$() jewels to mine longer!
